ygData.subject: Re: languages
ygData.msgSnippet: I have an FBR, Savant Cap, Dragoon Dagger, Stein, dusty Bloodstained gloves, some jewelry and Kobold Boots, but the majority of my clothes are still raw silk.
ygData.messageBody:
I have an FBR, Savant Cap, Dragoon Dagger, Stein, dusty Bloodstained gloves, some jewelry and Kobold Boots, but the majority of my clothes are still raw silk. The prices on neat things are a little mindboggling compared to my bank account, until recently, and Im not much of a merchant.

Shannyn, on Tunare server



>>> Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...> 01/12/00 08:35AM >>>
From: Sergey Bukhman <sergeyb@...>

> From: "PHAEDRA WHITLOCK" <PWHITLOCK@...>
>
> I wish!
>
> Actually Im a precocious lvl 27 unable to power level worth a darn. :) I am also a master smith, baker, swimmer, and halfway there on Tailoring and Fletching. I just like knowledge.
>
> Now if I could just get my Research to go up and get something to wear besides silk...
>
> --Shannyn of Tunare server
>

If you're 27 and don't have an FBR and at least one or two other special
clothing items, you're doing something wrong.

Unless you're on a new server.

--
Sergey

"Zed wantd nookie and the brother of brothers blame her for the
destruction of their planet."
-Dan Tropea
